mapper.select: SELECT RP_CODE AS RPCODE, RP_DATE AS RPDATE, RP_CONTENT AS RPCONTENT, RP_MODATE AS RPMODATE, BO_CODE AS BOCODE ,(SELECT GU_NICK FROM GUEST WHERE GU_CODE = R.GU_CODE)|| '(' || (SELECT RPAD(SUBSTR(GU_ID, 1,4),8,'*') || ')' FROM GUEST WHERE GU_CODE = R.GU_CODE)AS RPWRITER , GU_CODE AS GUCODE FROM REPLY R WHERE BO_CODE = ${boCode} ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(RPCODE)

SELECT RRE_CODE AS RRECODE, RRE_DATE AS RREDATE, RRE_CONTENT AS RRECONTENT, RRE_MODATE AS RREMODATE, RP_CODE AS RPCODE ,(SELECT GU_NICK FROM GUEST WHERE GU_CODE = RR.GU_CODE)|| '(' || (SELECT RPAD(SUBSTR(GU_ID, 1,4),8,'*') || ')' FROM GUEST WHERE GU_CODE = RR.GU_CODE)AS RREWRITER, GU_CODE AS GUCODE FROM RE_REPLY RR ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(RRECODE)
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM( SELECT RP_CODE, BO_CODE FROM REPLY UNION ALL SELECT RR.RP_CODE, RP.BO_CODE FROM REPLY RP RIGHT JOIN re_reply RR ON RP.RP_CODE = RR.RP_CODE) WHERE BO_CODE = ${boCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPLY(RP_CODE, RP_DATE, RP_CONTENT, RP_MODATE, BO_CODE, GU_CODE) VALUES(TO_CHAR(REPLY_SEQ.NEXTVAL), DEFAULT, #{rpContent}, DEFAULT, #{boCode}, #{guCode})
INSERT INTO RE_REPLY(RRE_CODE, RRE_DATE, RRE_CONTENT, RRE_MODATE, RP_CODE, GU_CODE) VALUES(TO_CHAR(RE_REPLY_SEQ.NEXTVAL), DEFAULT, #{rreContent}, DEFAULT, #{rpCode}, #{guCode})
